Blacknighmare::

Blacknightmare put her arms around his neck.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Could somebody take Symphony back?  He's in stasis lock so I 
can't really do anything with him.
> 
> ::Skullgrin/Triggerhappy/Cutthroat/Bodicons/Quatro/Orchestra::
> 
>   Skullgrin was happy that Megatron won.
> 
>    "I swear loyalty to you Megatron!" Skullgrin said.
> 
>    "Ya, what he said," Triggerhappy said, standing in the 
background.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>       Decapitron and the other Bodicons were honored to finally 
meet Megatron, who they had heard so much about in Decepticon history 
as well as Galvatron.
> 
>       "Megatron, me and my Bodicons promise to serve you without 
question," Decapitron pledged. 
> 
>       The Bodicons just nodded.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>      Cutthroat stopped firing at Motormaster and Megatron.
> 
>      "Megatron win battle!  Megatron leader!  Cool..." Cutthroat 
cheered.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> OOC:Okay, I sent this before, but I am just sending the last part 
of this post, to make sure Yan posts with Iron Raptor to reply to it.
> 
> IC: Quatro opened a special communications link with Iron Raptor.
(He doesn't need no special wrist device or anything, he has a 
special device planted inside of him, so he can talk like normal 
except over long distances and when he is engaged in a long distance 
conversation his eyes glow blue instead of green)
> 
>            "Iron Raptor, leader of the Maximals, I am universal 
bounty hunter Quatro, and I came to Earth to kill Hell Beast and 
Megatron.  I was thinking that I could side with you for a while, and 
we may be able to help eachother," Quatro said.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>      Orchestra grinned, then drew her closer to him and started a 
deep kiss.
